title: Any Video Converter Ultimate 5.7.5 + Patch [SWEG]
description:
Includes the Any Video Converter Ultimate v5.7.5 installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!

Any Video Converter Ultimate is an all-in-one DVD ripper and video converter solution. With it you can convert to and from various formats, including HD video and DVD.


FEATURES:

-Multilingual
-Rip DVD discs/folders, including encrypted ones
-Presets for popular devices such as iPod, PSP, Zune and more
-Support for HD video (input and output)
-Extract audio from video
-Save snapshots from video
-Record video from your desktop
-Author and burn DVDs
-Output HTML5 video with embed code
-Download videos from many online sources (Google, MetaCafe, Facebook, YouTube, Vevo, Vimeo, etcÃ¢â‚¬Â¦)
-CUDA acceleration support
-Batch conversion support
-Custom and preset output settings
-Merge or split videos
-Add watermarks
-Cropping
-Adjust brightness, contrast and saturation
-Rotate or flip video
-Add subtitles to video
-Faststart support for MP4 to enable streaming

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?

-Added 10 new profiles including iPad Air 2, iPad Mini 3, Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy Note 4, Samsung Galaxy Note Pro 12.2, Nexus 6, Nexus 9, etc.
-Added M4V output format
-You can decide whether to join customer experience improvement plan during the installation
-Fixed M4A merging problem
-Fixed audio synchronization problem when NVidia CUDA acceleration is enabled
-Added support for 4K and more output sizes larger than 1080P for AVI, MP4, MKV, M2TS, MOV, etc.
-Fixed some minor bugs and adjusted some user interface items
